Battle Medicine: (1) Uses Medicine to restore Hit Points once per target per day
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Glean Lore: (1) Religion check gives accurate info or a clue about a desired topic on critical success, one true and one false bit of info on success, incorrect info on failure, and two bits of false info on critical failure
Group Aid: (F) After Aiding an ally, Aids another on the same skill
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Read Lips: Can read the lips of those who can be seen clearly; in difficult circumstances, this requires a Society check and may inflict fascinated and off-guard
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead; may target hidden allies with a DC 5 flat check
Sign Language: Knows the sign equivalents of understood languages
Streetwise: Can use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge with on any trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 228 Armor Class: 38 (dexterity; expert) Class DC: Oracle: 36 (charisma; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Longspear (+28 1d8+4 P; strength; expert); Mace (+28 1d6+4 B; strength; expert); Spiked Gauntlet (+28 1d4+4 P; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Dagger): Weapon Familiarity (Dagger)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +29 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +31 (wisdom; legendary)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Greater Mysterious Resolve: Save Legendary (Will)
Mysterious Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Premonition's Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Divine Aegis: (R) Gives self -1 saves vs. divine magical effects and +1 vs. non-divine until the start of the next turn
Duskwalker: Cannot become undead
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Greater Mysterious Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes, critical Will failures are normal failures, and failed Will saves inflict half damage
Mysterious Resolve: Success on Will saves are critical successes
Stubborn Persistence: Successful DC 17 flat check negates becoming fatigued
Magic
Spell Slots: D10: 2; D1: 4; D2: 4; D3: 4; D4: 4; D5: 4; D6: 4; D7: 4; D8: 4; D9: 4; DC1: 5 Attack: Divine: +32 (charisma; legendary) Spell DC: Divine: 42 (charisma; legendary)
Magic Notes:
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Divine)
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Divine)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Divine)
Oracular Providence: +1 10th level spell slot
Bespell Strikes: (F) After casting a non-cantrip spell, causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until the end of the turn once per turn; the damage type is force or the same type as the spell inflicted
Bones: TODO
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Divine Access: Can learn 3 cleric spells from a deity with a shared domain
Extreme Curse: Can tolerate cursebound severity 4
Foretell Harm: (F) Target of a damaging non-cantrip spell takes additional damage equal to the spell rank at the beginning of its turn once per target per day once per rd
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-level Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-level during Seek
Major Curse: Can tolerate cursebound severity 3
Meddling Futures: (F) Randomly gives self an additional Strike, Perception check or skill action, spell cast, or move action, with a bonus based on cursebound level
Nudge The Scales: (1) May gain void healing effects during daily prep
Nudge The Scales: (1) R30' Target regains 42 Hit Points
Oracle Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of level 7 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Revelation Spells: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 10 available vs. 41 allocated
Domain Fluency Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 12 and domain acumen feature
Skill Increase Allocation: 16 available vs. 9 allocated
The Dead Walk Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 10 and ancestors feature or battle feature
Trial By Skyfire Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 10 and cosmos feature or flames feature
Waters Of Creation Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 10 and life feature or tempest feature
